Reviews.Title: Weatherproof phone! Great
Reviews.Author: Rocky Sprague
Reviews.Content: Great phone just what i needed the newest android i sometimes connect to my D7100 HD-SLR and shoot photo's at random but other than that its a nice phone dont have to worry about weather box states it can go 3 feet underwater for upto 30 mins! great it will survive that splash and all

Reviews.Title: Great so far...
Reviews.Author: Jesi Drake
Reviews.Content: All in all, I love this phone... but it IS rather slow. This doesn't bother me so much because I'm pretty patient, but I could see this bothering an avid techie pretty quickly. For the money though, this is the best virgin mobile phone for me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Racahel
Reviews.Content: This phone has everything I want, I love that I can use my music for ringtones. My only complaint about the phone is that the camera has a delay I Hope that it is something that I can find and personalize if not eh well the phone is still awesome.

Reviews.Title: my new phone
Reviews.Author: Pamela Swales
Reviews.Content: love my new phone thank you virgin mobil for coming up with this one easy to use and outstanding apps, and to top it off it is water resistant woo hoo

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Magarian
Reviews.Content: It didn't always provide clear reception but the camera was great!  I've notice that the reception is for some reason improving with time (not sure why).  Overall, for the money it's a pretty neat (I'm showing my age lol) product and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: kick ass!!
Reviews.Author: Ashlynne
Reviews.Content: Ok the fact it's water resistent up to 3 feet is awesome!!! My LG optimus got destroyed because kids tipped pop on it. Well jeez somethibg spills or dropped in water you can rinse this phone off and dry it. Superb!! Now with that beibg said its not break proof, i do have a rubber case on it for shock resistant, but no more bulky water resistant cases!! :) :)

Reviews.Title: Worst Phone Ever
Reviews.Author: Antionette Elliott
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money! The phone died at first for no reason at all. It would shut down a lot. It is horrible. I had it 4 months and I'm buying a new one

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Donna M.
Reviews.Content: It's perfect.  My daughter dropped it in a puddle of water.  Still working perfectly.  Came on time and really impressive.  Everything about the features and use is exactly as described.  Very pleased with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone great quality for the price.
Reviews.Author: Lyndsay Ortiz "Lyndsay O."
Reviews.Content: I'm the first to admit, I do not know much about cell phones only that I don't want to pay to much for something that will be behind the times in a few months. I got the reef a month ago in  December 2013 and absolutly love it. I'm more than happy with the picture quality and the speed of the phone. My wife who has a better phone and knows more about them than me is thinking of getting one for herself and that says alot.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my son for Christmas. The phone arrived packaged properly and looked new. We thought it was a good buy at first. But about a month after he got the phone the phone started resetting it self over and over.  Since then we've had trouble with the phone not posting text and turning it self off. Please do not purchase this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Phillips
Reviews.Content: First Smartphone, easy to use, great online manual from Virgin Mobile. Works a little better than my friends I-phone, haha

Reviews.Title: Pros & Cons/ Havin fun
Reviews.Author: Gerald V.
Reviews.Content: So far I really like this phone, the messaging and web are incredibly fast for 3G, it take quality photos and video, plus its waterproof and the youtube reviews seem to back up this claim, I don't plan to test it for verification. My only real gripe is the audio quality during phone calls is poor, I contacted Vigin Mobiles customer services and was impresed with their professionalism and efforts to improve my service. They performed diagnostics and the audio did improve but its random. This issue may be due to the region I reside in, there are lots of bodies of water, hills and mountains that affect cell signals, I had simular issues with my last verizon cotract. I will live with it for now and give Virgin mobile more chances to improve this issue, I'm having lots of fun with this phone though.:-)

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love this phone!!
Reviews.Author: sharelle davis
Reviews.Content: I haven't had any issues with the phone and it is working better than expected. Hubby dropped his phone in a puddle by accident and it hasn't had any problems.

ProductInfo.Features:
Display: 4.0-inches
Camera: 5-MP
Processor Speed: 1.0 GHz
OS: Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean)
ProductInfo.Name: ZTE Reef (Virgin Mobile)
